message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $80 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
